name: White and Black
description:
Disclaimer:  This is very much an early MVP of the game, the game will launch with many more features, levels, polishing, etc.  Originally created for Weekly Game Jam 77.

White and Black is  a new game targeted primarily for Android (attached files are for windows) about reaching the end of a level by defending yourself from enemies using your shield.  But beware! The world is constantly shifting between light and dark, time your actions poorly and pay the ultimate price.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left and Right Arrow Keys - Move shield
